titleStmt.title: The day of salvation, or, A homily upon the bloody sacrifice of Christ, or his death and passion written, and intended onely for private meditation of a most noble and vertuous lady, on Good-Friday last, but since thought worthy the publique view / by Anthony Stafford ...
titleStmt.author: Stafford, Anthony.

publicationStmt.publisher: By N. and I. Okes, for Daniel Frere at the Red Bull in Little Brittaine,

notesStmt.note: Errors in paging: numbers 114, 119-121 skipped in the pagination.
Imperfect: engraved t.p. lacking; tightly bound, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
